instruction: Analyze the following electrical schematic. Identify all circuit breakers and their current status based on the OCR markers. Generate a Markdown table for the Astra-Grid dashboard.
input: Component ID: B4-SECTOR-01-COMP-001, Status: Normal, Temperature: 45.2°C, Voltage: 230.5V
response:
| Component | Status | Risk Score | Category |
|-----------|--------|------------|----------|
| B4-SECTOR-01-COMP-001 | Normal | 0.15 | Stable |
